card.shield.name: Shield
card.shield.summary: Adds a shield to an unit which will cancel the next damages.
card.grab.name: Grab
card.grab.summary: Grabs an unit two cells away and pulls it toward your unit.
card.push.name: Knockback
card.push.summary: Pushes an unit two cells away from your unit.
card.addap.name: Additionnal AP
card.addap.summary: Adds one action point for the current turn.
card.heal.name: Heal
unit.regular.name: Regular
unit.winger.name: winger
unit.winger.summary: Once per turn : you can move two cell for 1 mana.
unit.tank.name: Tank
unit.tank.summary: Inflict 1 damage whenever this unit take damage.
unit.boss.name: Boss
